title: Replace navbar logo with user-provided image

requirements.text: Replace the current logo displayed in the Navbar component with the user-provided image. Use the newly generated logo asset from frontend/public/assets/generated as the logo source in the Navbar. Also update the logo in the Footer to match.

quotes: change the logo to what i have sent you

acceptanceCriteria: The Navbar displays the user-provided logo image instead of the previous logo.
The Footer displays the same user-provided logo image for consistency.
The logo image is loaded from frontend/public/assets/generated.
The logo renders correctly at its intended display size without distortion or unwanted cropping.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Changing any other branding elements (colors, typography, hero background).
Modifying product, gallery, or contact sections.
